: : Rodimus Prime : :
   
  Rodimus: I'll stay alert.

Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
          Nightlight:
   
  Nighlight hgued her daughter and opened  her comlink again "Remember that Hydras is treacherous and cunning, he must have think that you will follow Waspanator and prepared a trap in the road."
   
  Tears started to fall from Nightlight's cheeks
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 09, 2006 7:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Hydras ->(Rodimus, Inferno, Waspanator)
  

  : : Rodimus Prime : :
   
  As Waspinator dives into the forest Rodimus comes after him stopping with a screech.Rodimus travels the forest in robot mode. He takes a moment to respond to his wife via the commlink.
   
  Rodimus: Nightlight, I know I dont have any cover. Just keep Elita safe. I wont go rushing into the Predacon base or anything like that. Maybe I can stop Waspinator before he reaches Hydras. I'll contact you soon, love. Rodimus out.
   
  Rodimus continues to search for the Predacon bee bot.
  

CatMaster o <CatMastero@...> wrote:
  "Oh oh!" Waspinator commented when he saw the maximal giving chase. 
He made a turn and dived down into a forest hoping to use his smaller
size to his advantage.  He then shifted into beast mode.
"Waspinator must find way to lose nasty maximal! Then Waspinator get
reward!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Nightlight:
> 
> When Nighligh watched the missiles came she covered with ehr wings and 
> body Elita, she and her husband was the only bots that she cares.
> 
> "RODIMUS COME BACK!!!!"shouted Nighlight"It could be a trap!!!!!"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> >    
> >   Rodimus reacts quicly and jumps to the cover of his family, 
> blocking the falling debris.
> >    
> >   Rodimus Prime: I'm fast enough to keep up with him. I'll be back. 
> You two stay here. I love you.
> >    
> >   Rodimus transformes to vehical mode and speeds off after 
> Waspinator with full thrusters!
> >
>
